author: cnbc.com
title: Stonetrust Enters New States Missouri and Tennessee
text:
BATON ROUGE, La., April 3, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Stonetrust Commercial Insurance Company President and CEO Michael G. Dileo announced today that the company is now writing workers' compensation coverage in Missouri and Tennessee effective April 1, 2018.
"We're excited to now offer workers' compensation coverage and services in Missouri and Tennessee as part of our ongoing plans for expansion," said Dileo. "Our focus is to continue providing great service to our policyholders, their injured employees, and our loyal agents. We are also planning to enter Alabama and Kansas within the next 12 months."
Stonetrust is headquartered in Baton Rouge, Louisiana and is now operating in eight states including Louisiana, Texas, Oklahoma, Arkansas, Mississippi, and Nebraska in addition to Missouri and Tennessee.
Stonetrust is celebrating its 25 th anniversary of providing statutory workers' compensation insurance to employers large and small, with a concentration in construction, wholesale, retail, manufacturing and other service-related businesses.
For more information, please contact:
Michael G. Dileo
Phone: 225-201-8065
Email: mike.dileo@stonetrustinsurance.com
